transcript: when I was in high school I read this book called how to make friends and influence people and I think the second chapter or something is call people by their name is their favorite word in the whole language there was a guy who stopped his car got out and was like dude I had seen him 9 months earlier in the casino and I was like Oli and he was like no way and I was like solar Sals and he was like yes everybody was like holy that was insane and he thought it was insane too like when people die they're like I just want to be remembered so just do it while they're alive
